alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 28 at 4:21AM EST until January 30 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, Far Northern and Penobscot Valley Maine. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and cause hazardous travel. Power outages are possible. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis
